org.apache.felix.ipojo.manipulator.reporter

Class SystemReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.felix.ipojo.manipulator.reporter.EmptyReporter
      • org.apache.felix.ipojo.manipulator.reporter.SystemReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reporter

    public class SystemReporter
extends EmptyReporter
    A SystemReporter reports feedback from within the manipulation process.
    Author:
    Felix Project Team
